name: json_transform
description: Convert data between JSON, CSV, XML, YAML, and TOML formats. Also supports flattening nested objects, querying with JMESPath, comparing JSON objects (diff), and validating against JSON Schema.

action.description: The operation to perform: transform (convert formats), flatten (nested to dot-notation), unflatten (dot-notation to nested), query (JMESPath), diff (compare objects), validate (JSON Schema)

data.description: The data to process â€” object, array, or string depending on input format and action

original.description: Original object for comparison (for diff action)

modified.description: Modified object for comparison (for diff action)

schema.description: JSON Schema to validate against (for validate action)

options.description: Optional settings: pretty (bool), delimiter (string), headers (bool), rootElement (string), indent (number)
